Sentencas: A Ni-ScSZ cermet is widely used as the anode in a solid oxide fuel cell because it possesses the appropriate electrochemical properties.
Titulo: Microstructural changes in NiO-ScSZ composite following reduction processes in pure and diluted hydrogen

Sentencas: However, it is susceptible to degradation during operation.
Titulo: Microstructural changes in NiO-ScSZ composite following reduction processes in pure and diluted hydrogen

Sentencas: Samples of a NiO-ScSZ composite were reduced in pure and diluted hydrogen to determine the microstructural evolution and the degradation behavior of the material.
Titulo: Microstructural changes in NiO-ScSZ composite following reduction processes in pure and diluted hydrogen

Sentencas: The resulting changes in microstructure were investigated using scanning transmission electron microscopy, X-ray energy dispersive spectroscopy and electron energy loss spectroscopy.
Titulo: Microstructural changes in NiO-ScSZ composite following reduction processes in pure and diluted hydrogen

Sentencas: The resulting data revealed that the various conditions during the reduction processes had a significant effect on the microstructures.
Titulo: Microstructural changes in NiO-ScSZ composite following reduction processes in pure and diluted hydrogen

Sentencas: The high porosity of the reduced nickel phase and cracking between the Ni and the ZrO2 phases after reduction resulted in a reduction in the strength of the anode material.
Titulo: Microstructural changes in NiO-ScSZ composite following reduction processes in pure and diluted hydrogen
